Footer

To add some footer links, create a yaml file in the _data directory using the following format.

- name: Blog
  link: /blog/
- name: About
  link: /about/
- name: Privacy Policy
  link: /privacy-policy/

Then add the name of your yaml file (without the .yml extension) into the footer_menu setting in the _config.yml.

footer_menu: example_footer_menu

Hiding the footer

If you would like to hide the footer on a particular page then set hide_footer: true in the pageâ€™s front matter.
